channel.title: Yell Rank Colours
channel.description:
Okay I know theres like 5million topics about yell colours but yeah. Basically in the yell I want the yell to be like this. [Staff]Cheese: Hiii bla bla bla
The name can be left Black but how do I get the Staff to be coloured blue and how do I get yell colours.
For example, ::yell @red@ Yo!!!! I've followed tuts but they dont work and only bring me errors.
Im using Demise's Client and Server source :O
